title: Samsung Digital Key adds support for more cars from BMW, Genesis, and Kia
content:
At the Galaxy Unpacked event last year, Samsung introduced Digital Key, allowing users to turn their smartphone into a digital car key. The feature relies on NFC and UWB to let you lock and unlock your car, start the engine, adjust seats, and more. At launch, the Digital Key feature only worked with a handful

The post Samsung Digital Key adds support for more cars from BMW, Genesis, and Kia appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Samsung's digital car key now supports several new cars, including Genesis GV90 and BMW's 1-8, Z4, X5-X7, iX, i5 and iX4 series.
